Home.title: Review Your Risk
Home.subtitle: Your versatile multi-currency approve record management utility. Effortlessly gain insights into approve statuses and identify suspicious addresses

Features.FeatureISubI: We possess an extensive and complete database of malicious approval addresses, ensuring you can swiftly and accurately identify any suspicious addresses that have been approved
Features.FeatureIISubI: Effortlessly terminate, one-click execution, which can release all approve related to the designated contract. At the same time, you can also choose to revoke individual approve, providing a more flexible way to manage your digital asset approve.
Features.FeatureIISubII: Note: When revoking multiple approval, you need to manually confirm the revocation of each one.
Features.FeatureIIISubI: View approve records for ARB, BSC, TRX, ETH, and more, all in one place to manage your digital wallet effortlessly

DetailPage.Empty: A safe account with no approval :)
DetailPage.SaveAddress: No risk address approval record found
